name: Good Twitter 2021 — ALL modes supported!
description:
Formerly (Good-ish Twitter) — Get a little bit of the old "good" Twitter feeling back. Combines the best parts of the old layout with the best parts of the new application. Recently added support for dark and dim modes all in one.

Moved navigation to a top bar instead of left-side column, with better notification indicators in the menu, and an overall "tighter" appearance. A few less severe curves and "bubbles," and a gray background to frame your timeline. Plus some other modifications to clean things up. 

06-10-2021 - Various fixes and quality of life updates from Twitter changes.
06-19-2020 - Fixed "new tweets" button cutoff. 
04-24-2020 - Fixed the profile thumbnail drop-down menu that was added recently. Fixed the top header bar positioning. 
08-21-2019 - Fixed sidebar search box positioning after the most recent update.
additional_info: Version: 3.0 - Fixed lots of bugs from new features and changes from Twitter.

discussions.name: [fixed] Top bar isn't showing properly with languages that aren't english
No dark theme support kinda sucks.
